name: skills (ghostsecurity)
description: [项目级] Ghost Security's collection of AppSec skills for AI coding agents。来源: https://github.com/ghostsecurity/skills

genes.title: 项目概述
genes.content:
Ghost Security's collection of AppSec skills for AI coding agents

来源: https://github.com/ghostsecurity/skills
语言: Shell
Stars: 202

genes.title: 安装与快速开始
genes.content:
claude plugin marketplace add ghostsecurity/skills
claude plugin install ghost@ghost-security
claude

genes.title: 核心特性
genes.content: [Open an Issue](https://github.com/ghostsecurity/skills/issues/new) per the [Contributing](.github/CONTRIBUTING.md) guidelines and [Code of Conduct](.github/CODE_OF_CONDUCT.md)

name: skills/plugins 模块
description: [模块级] skills 项目的 plugins 模块 (source)。来源: https://github.com/ghostsecurity/skills

genes.title: plugins 模块说明
genes.content:
模块路径: plugins/
类型: source
文件数: 66

包含文件:
- plugins/ghost
- plugins/ghost/.claude-plugin
- plugins/ghost/.claude-plugin/plugin.json
- plugins/ghost/CHANGELOG.md
- plugins/ghost/README.md
- plugins/ghost/skills
- plugins/ghost/skills/proxy
- plugins/ghost/skills/proxy/SKILL.md
- plugins/ghost/skills/repo-context
- plugins/ghost/skills/repo-context/SKILL.md
